spells.name: Light Binding
spells.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage.

spells.name: Prismatic Barrier
spells.description: Lux throws her wand and bends light around allies, shielding them.

spells.name: Lucent Singularity
spells.description: Lux sends an irregular light sphere that slows and damages enemies.

spells.name: Final Spark
spells.description: Lux fires a giant laser that damages all enemies in the area.

passive.name: Illumination
passive.description: Lux's spells mark enemies with light energy that her attacks detonate for bonus damage.

spells.name: Steel Tempest
spells.description: Yasuo thrusts his sword forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Yasuo creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles.

spells.name: Sweeping Blade
spells.description: Yasuo dashes through an enemy, dealing damage and marking them.

spells.name: Last Breath
spells.description: Yasuo blinks to an airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage.

passive.name: Way of the Wanderer
passive.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds up a shield when moving.
